name: flutter_libphonenumber_ios
summary: Leverages libphonenumber to allow for asynchronous and synchronous formatting of phone numbers in Flutter apps. Includes a TextInputFormatter to allow real-time AsYouType formatting.
description: Leverages libphonenumber to allow for asynchronous and synchronous formatting of phone numbers in Flutter apps. Includes a TextInputFormatter to allow real-time AsYouType formatting.
